mapper.select: SELECT out_code AS outCode, order_number AS orderNumber, client_code AS clientCode, company_code AS companyCode, out_type AS outType, trans_type AS transType, out_plan_date AS outPlanDate, out_manager AS outManager, out_status AS outStatus, memo, create_date AS createDate, create_user AS createUser, update_date AS updateDate, update_user AS updateUser, delete_yes_no AS deleteYesNo FROM so_shipout where delete_yes_no="N"
